summary: A medium sized, Dwemer themed house outside of Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
Thaurkat (lit. place of magics) is a Dwemer ruin outside of Windhelm fully kitted out for the intrepid adventurer.
----------------------
WIP: Finished, but future plans include adding to the Tower Roof area to give it some sort of purpose (undecided), and adding general clutter about the place if people want.
-----------------------
Contains:
-Throne Room
  The main chamber, containing waterfalls and a raised dais with the eponymous throne and two smaller ones for companions and whatnot
-Basement
  The hub of the operation. Contains all smithing equipment, 6 safe chests, 9 display cases, 8 small weapons plaques, 4 large weapons plaques, 8 mannequins, and 5 bookcases (storage for 195 books).
-Tower
  For the mages, contains 3/4 more weapons plaques, storage and enchanting and alchemy tables
-Tower Roof
  Nuttin, for the minute, save some nice views
- Bedroom
Perfect for unwinding on your nice, comfy stone bed. Features 3 more bookcases (117 books), 2 chests, 2, mannequins, 4 plaques, 2 large plaques and 2 display cases
---------------
All fully NavMeshed, everything should work. If you have any ideas or something done messed up, message me/comment.
author: Nehviir
